title: In reversal, Trump to save Chinese telecom jobs
text:
In reversal, Trump to save Chinese telecom jobs 10:11am BST - 01:56
U.S. President Donald Trump said in a tweet on Sunday that he has asked the Commerce Department to help Chinese technology company ZTE Corp 'get back into business, fast,' a concession to Beijing ahead of high-stakes trade talks that will take place this week. Lisa Bernhard reports.

Lisa Bernhard reports. //reut.rs/2KWNoX4
